collection.name: Doomsday Calendar
collection.openText: You, too, will be a live offering.

specialTipSize.specialTip: The Qliphoth Counter of $0 will decrease by 1 at the start of meltdown level.
After performing the sacrifice work on $0, its Qliphoth Counter will immediately increase, causing certain damage to the agent or clerk involved.
The lower the Qliphoth Counter, the higher the damage caused by the sacrifice work.

After the Qliphoth Counter of $0 reaches zero, it will enter a state of countdown for 120 seconds and only perform Sacrifice work will be avaliable. If the counter remains at zero for a whole 120 seconds, it will inflict high black damage on units within a certain range.
Once the counter reaches 0, it will generate 3 "Doomsday Clay Doll" every 60 seconds and also reduce its own counter further.

When a "Doomsday Clay Doll" dies, it will immediately increase the Qliphoth Counter of $0, however 60 seconds have to pass before you can increase the counter again killing a clay doll, this counter raise temporarily delays the massive black wave of damage.
